data.tweet: In this match, Ryan Sessegnon also attempted three challenges in the defensive third - more than any other player on the pitch.
Cristian Romero completed 70 passes (out of 76) and played 13 successful long balls - both more than any other player on the pitch.
Romero passed the ball a combined 464 yards towards the opponent's goal, more than any other player on the pitch (closely followed by Lenglet).
Romero also made three interceptions and won three aerial duels.
